/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians add to the dynamic nature of the scene, suggesting a city that is always on the move. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene contrast to the bustling activity below.
